Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text:
Complete the following: 
SPN3420 - Spanish Composition (3)

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Learn to speak & understand Spanish specific for tourism industry including field-specific techniques of communication, multicultural environments, understanding of Spanish culture, & needs of bilingual tourists.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduction to translation and interpretation, practical applications of theory applied to professional written and audio texts from Spanish to English and from English to Spanish.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

SPT3831 - Spanish Legal Translation and.name: SPT3831 - Spanish Legal Translation and Interpretation

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The terminology, procedures and ethics required to be a Spanish language court interpreter and translator in the legal field.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text:
Complete the following: 
SPT3800 - Spanish Translation and Interpretation (3)

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Development of translation and interpretation skills in a professional environment. Concentration in legal, medical, and business areas.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Provides hands on experience with CAT (Computer Assisted Translation) tools that external translation and interpretation agencies require in their hiring profiles

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

SPT3805 - Spanish Translation and Interp.name: SPT3805 - Spanish Translation and Interpretation for Mass Communication

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text:
Complete the following: 
SPN3420 - Spanish Composition (3)

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Translation and interpretation in mass communication using all forms of media.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic Spanish terminology, techniques and ethics in the field of medical translation and interpretation.
